import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from '../products'; const ProductScreen = (props) => { const match = { params: { id: 1} } const ids = document.location.href.split('/'); const id = ids[ids.length - 1]; const product = products.find((p) => p._id == match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock ':'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
